thread.title: G Marine Yacht Boutique Introduces Three New European Yachts at Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show
thread.title_full: G Marine Yacht Boutique Introduces Three New European Yachts at Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: G Marine Yacht Boutique Introduces Three New European Yachts at Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show
text:
G Marine Yachts
Miami Broker Represents Spanish Boat Yard, Astondoa, UK's Fairline and adds a new Spanish line, FAETON
MIAMI , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- G Marine , "Your European Yacht Boutique," will introduce three new yacht models, The Astondoa 80 GLX, the Fairline Targa 53 and the FAETON 36 Formentera, during the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show, November 5-9, 2015 at F/G Dock 9-11, slips 34-39.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278693
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278694
As the exclusive dealer for several major European brands, the Miami, Florida -based G Marine will feature yachts making their American debut at the world's largest in-water boat show.
As Astondoa prepares to celebrate its 100 th anniversary, the Spanish shipyard brings a brand new customized 80 GLX to Fort Lauderdale , demonstrating its signature blend of luxury and value. Each of its vessels is truly a custom design, reflecting the owner's personality, and yachting lifestyle. In addition, Fairline will debut a new 53 Targa GT and FAETON will display a newly designed Formentera 36.
Astondoa 80 GLX
Luxury cruising and sporty performance meld in the new Astondoa 80 GLX . This express yacht feels like a luxury megayacht, but cruises like a powerboat at 25 knots with top speed of 31 knots. Using customized interior and exterior layouts as well as fully custom-built cabinetry the Astondoa 80 GLX can be created to maximize relaxation and entertainment while at sea. The show model features the fine furnishings custom-built by the shipyard, which has long been one of the company's signatures-beyond yachts to the most prestigious homes and estates of Europe .
On the main deck, large wrap-around windows bring the outdoors in; while enhancing natural light at the interior port-side helm station, spacious dining and seating areas, the expansive glass also provides excellent water views.
Specially whitewashed stained interior flooring complements the neutral color scheme, brightened by use of white and taupe leather throughout. Marble and glass accents in the en suite heads for four staterooms add color and shine while rich textures of wood and fabrics demonstrate the design excellence made possible by the custom build. The fully appointed outdoor spaces cater to water recreation and entertainment, with a sizable swim platform and garage for a tender or many water toys.
Fairline Targa 53 GT
G Marine introduces a new sleek express cruiser yacht, the Fairline Targa 53 GT , the latest addition from the UK's finest production yacht builder. A beautifully tapered hull and panoramic windows bathe the cabins with natural light.
The cockpit adjoins the saloon where a J-style bench seat converts into a sun pad and opens to the aft deck through sliding stainless steel doors. Dining and lounging alfresco are comfortable and easy aboard this express cruiser. Three staterooms including a large master midship a double and twin guest, accommodate fellow cruisers in style. A breakthrough in customization for the production line, Fairline's Targa 53 GT offers opportunities to customize the boat to the owner's taste, incorporating varying wood finishes and configurations, power options and even a crew cabin.
36 Formentera
The new Formentera series from FAETON features a revolutionary center console design created by G Marine and the Spanish boat yard. For 30 years, FAETON has served as Astondoa's line of 23 to 40-foot rugged sport boats, and has becoming Spain's category leader and one of the largest recreation boat builders in Europe .
Styled with European sweptback lines, the Formentera 36 was built for American boating lifestyles and it easily reaches 43 knots top speed with twin Mercury Verado 300 HP outboards. The Formentera is a lot of boat in 36 feet-even a berth and galley--and priced to get boaters on the water.
G Marine offers a fine and diverse selection of new or brokerage yachts for any need and budget. The exclusive dealers to the Americas for Spanish yard, Astondoa, the Florida dealer for UK builder, Fairline and a US dealer for Finland's Axopar as well as other lines, G Marine's in-water showroom is ideally located on the Miami River near the Miami International Airport. For more information visit www.gmyachts.com or call 305-330-1025. 305.330.102505.330.1025
High-resolution photos available upon request or at the Press Page of the website.
